data.name: Gapori_0
data.value: Oh darn it! Not another prison cell...!

data.name: Gapori_1
data.value: You guys are apprehended. What just happened?

data.name: Answer_0_A
data.value: They think we're the threat...

data.name: Answer_0_B
data.value: I don't know exactly!

data.name: Gapori_2_A
data.value: Wow.. To think that monarch is a manchild. It could get any worse.

data.name: Gapori_2_B
data.value: Me neither!

data.name: Gapori_3
data.value: What? You want to ask about how I entered that cell.

data.name: Gapori_4
data.value: First of all, I was just sneaking in to gain an advantage over the monarch.

data.name: Gapori_5
data.value: However, the guards cleverly noticed where I was hiding, and guess what? It's chasing time.

data.name: Gapori_6
data.value: I tried to fight back using Swift but no can do, They were able to withstand my attacks.

data.name: Gapori_7
data.value: It is where I am kept in the basement locked up...

data.name: Gapori_8
data.value: The name's Gapori. and you are...

data.name: Answer_1_A
data.value: The Adventurers

data.name: Answer_1_B
data.value: Just some folks passing through

data.name: Gapori_9_A
data.value: As I anticipated. Let me share a story about what I know:

data.name: Gapori_9_B
data.value: Huh? But you do more like adventurers to me? Doesn't matter...

data.name: Gapori_10
data.value: According to legend, the incident was called a "Throwback Disaster."

data.name: Gapori_11
data.value: According to the book that they provided, some contents from traditional gaming and the era before modernity have entered the world. I was one of them. If you're asking me when exactly this took place? maybe the machine that brought us here. Like characters, monsters, elements, and, I repeat, contents-

data.name: Answer_2_A
data.value: Even Audios, like Musics as well?

data.name: Answer_2_B
data.value: Interesting!

data.name: Gapori_12_A
data.value: Pfft! You're insane!

data.name: Gapori_12_B
data.value: I'm not done talking yet!

data.name: Gapori_13
data.value: What's that? You've encountered a baby Vulpix at the end of the Crystal Cave?

data.name: Gapori_14
data.value: LOL! What were you thinking while you were hallucinating?

data.name: Gapori_15
data.value: In any case, I had a strategy for when I got back into the game where I belongs. For the time being, we'll get out of here, so don't worry.

data.name: Gapori_16
data.value: W..What the!? How did...

data.name: Kecleon_0
data.value: Don't be surprised.

data.name: Gapori_17
data.value: Who are you? Show yourself!

data.name: Kecleon_1
data.value: Come on, Time's wasting. You don't want to be stuck in the pathetic place.

data.name: Gapori_18
data.value: But there's some enemies in front of them.

data.name: Kecleon_2
data.value: Oh! Well... uhh... We...

data.name: Kecleon_2-1
data.value: Fight them!

data.name: Gapori_19
data.value: Fight?

data.name: Kecleon_3
data.value: Yeah, Fight!

data.name: Gapori_20
data.value: I don't know... Based on what I can do, I tried once. only to lose out to them.

data.name: Kecleon_4
data.value: Amateur...! I'll show you how's done.

data.name: Kecleon_5
data.value: What? You can fight them back too? Well, Let's see what you got against them. On three.

data.name: Gapori_21
data.value: W-wait! It's not even three yet!! Wait for me!!

data.name: Noctowl_0
data.value: Oh, Good Morning, {0}!

data.name: Noctowl_1
data.value: I'd just prepared a dungeon for you just so you can recruit Psychic and Ground-type to do against Nidoqueen Royales.

data.name: Noctowl_2
data.value: I wish you the best of luck on your journey there!

data.name: Message_0
data.value: Ouch! You were harmed!

data.name: Message_1
data.value: Thankfully for plot reasons, You were recuperated from being oblivious, Now get out there and Battle!

data.name: Message_2
data.value: Ready to take on Nidoqueen Royales?

data.name: Vulpix_0
data.value: Dammit... How did we got into this...?

data.name: Shop_Bag_Empty
data.value: What a bummer, You have nothing to sell.

data.name: Shop_Bag_Full
data.value: Before you make a purchase, please clear some space, okay?

data.name: Shop_Buy
data.value: Hold on, Let me see what I got...! (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Shop_Buy_Complete
data.value: I am grateful for your business!

data.name: Shop_Buy_Empty
data.value: Tomorrow, we'll replenish! Sorry!

data.name: Shop_Buy_Multi
data.value: Altogether, that comes to {0}. Is that OK?

data.name: Shop_Buy_No_Money
data.value: Come on, you can't fool me without my money.

data.name: Shop_Buy_One
data.value: That {1}? That will be {0}.

data.name: Shop_Goodbye
data.value: See you next time!

data.name: Shop_Intro
data.value: So, do you have any connection to my company?

data.name: Shop_Intro_Return
data.value: May I help you with anything else?

data.name: Shop_Option_Buy
data.value: Buy

data.name: Shop_Option_Sell
data.value: Sell

data.name: Shop_Sell
data.value: Oh... Uhh... What do you got? (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Shop_Sell_Complete
data.value: Thanks!

data.name: Shop_Sell_Multi
data.value: I can pay {0} for everything, yes?

data.name: Shop_Sell_One
data.value: I can pay {0} for that {1}, yes?
